section.title: Installation
section.para: Anyframe Query Manager is deployed in compressed file in Eclipse Update Site and Anyframe Portal.

section.title: Eclipse Update Site
section.para: Add http://dev.anyframejava.org/update , Anyframe Update Site, through Help > Install New Software on Eclipse.

note.title: Note : Update Site
note.para: For Anyframe Query Manager installation, Anyframe Common(4.0.2) must be installed.

note.title: Note : Upgrading Anyframe Query Manager 2.1.7 to 2.1.8
note.para: Query Manager that grew in the package, Anyframe Query Manager 2.1.7 and Anyframe Query Manager 2.1.8 is recognized as a separate plug-in, delete the existing 2.1.7 version of the plug-in is installed after. This Anyframe Common(4.0.2) is applied equally.

section.title: Deploying compressed file
section.para: Install the Anyframe Query Manager deployed in compressed file as the following order.

listitem.para: For Anyframe Query Manager installation, check System Requirements.
Check the latest deployment version of Anyframe Query Manager .
Download the latest deployment version of Anyframe Query Manager ("anyframe.querymanager.eclipse_x.x.x-bin.zip") to user's computer.
Extract the compression file of the latest deployment version to the user-defined folder.
Move the extracted Plugin package file ("anyframe.querymanager.eclipse_x.x.x.jar") at "[eclipse installation folder]/dropins/anyframe/eclipse/plugins" or "[eclipse installation folder]/plugins".
If Eclipse is in use, restart it.
Check whether the installation was successful through "About Eclipse Platform (or About Eclipse SDK) > Plug-in Details".
☞ For Eclipse Platform (or About Eclipse SDK) menu, you can check Help menu at Windows Eclipse and Eclipse menu at Mac OS X Eclipse.
Anyframe Query Manager was installed successfully.

section.title: Upgrade from the Previous Version
section.para: When upgrading Anyframe Query Manager 2.0.0 version or under to 2.1.0 onwards, do the following order.

listitem.para: Eclipse SQL Explorer version upgrade : Delete exisiting 3.5 RC version through "[eclipse folder]/dropins/[Eclipse SQL Explorer installation folder]"or "Help > About Eclipse" and install 3.5.1 version.
☞ It is recommended to install Eclipse SQL Explorer 3.5.1 version by using Eclipse Software Updates due to package composition error.
For Anyframe Query Manager 2.1.0 version onwards, the following requirements must be satisfied.
listitem.programlisting: Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers (Galileo) Anyframe Common 4.0.2 Eclipse SQL Explorer 3.5.1

para.emphasis: When using Package other than Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers

listitem.para: Compared with other packages, Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers contains various Plugins useful for developers and is recommended package for Anyframe-based development. However, if you need to install Anyframe Query Manager to Eclipse IDE package, check the following Plug-ins dependencies and install and use Anyframe Query Manager after installing the plugin.
